channel.title: Editing drops?
channel.description:
Please, someone help me... look at my code
npcdrop = 84 5 15344 1 15347 1 15346 1 6585 1 15352 1 15333 1 15384 1 15349 1 3751 1 15156 1 892 10000
that code above is in my npcdrops.cfg and the 5 is the drop type ive tried 1-5 and none worked
please someone tell me how to fix this so my black demons get ownage :D
